normal\_form\_rules: Always rewrite ψ∘δ, ψ∘Φ, ψ∘Π into ψ\_δ, ψ\_Φ, ψ\_Π.
Tensor waves use ψ⊗ instead of nested ψ∘ψ compositions.
For weighted expressions, move μ outward unless crossing δ (where δ(μ) must appear).
For curved expressions, decompose λ into (λ\_curv, λ\_mode, λ\_x) before computing ψ interactions.
Canonical ordering: δ → Φ → Π → ψ.
